DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Venlafaxine XR Elderly Patients With Major Depression
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective pilot study evaluate safety venlafaxine extend release formulation ( XR ) treatment geriatric non-psychotic depression . This pilot study 's specific aim assess safety venlafaxine XR geriatric population , estimate response rate old depressed subject treat open condition evaluate pharmacokinetic characteristic may impact safety outcome .
